medical_history.chief_complaint: 2 days of RUQ pain, worsening confusion, weakness, and decreased po intake.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 2 days prior to presentation, with worsening confusion, weakness, and decreased po intake. The patient also experienced subjective fevers and new jaundice during this period. No nausea or vomiting was reported.
medical_history.family_history: Brother with CAD/PVD, Mother with unspecified condition, Sister with CAD/PVD.
